mapper.insert: INSERT into members ( grade_idx ,member_type, name, contact_num, create_date, expiry_date, brithdate, gender, postal_code, street_address, detail_address, member_state, reg_by) values (#{grade_idx},#{member_type},#{name},#{num},curdate(),DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), #{brithdate},#{gender}, #{ postal_code}, #{street_address}, #{detail_address},#{member_state}, 00990099)

INSERT into members ( grade_idx ,member_type, name, contact_num, create_date, expiry_date, brithdate, gender, postal_code, street_address, detail_address, member_state, reg_by, business_num) values (#{grade_idx},#{member_type},#{name},#{num},curdate(),DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), #{brithdate},#{gender}, #{ postal_code}, #{street_address}, #{detail_address},#{member_state}, 00990099,#{business_num})
